channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024121183
item.description:
Report X-2024121183

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-20
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A PACKAGE WITH NO DOT LABEL FOUND CONTAINING REGULATED ITEMS INSIDE OF THE PACKAGE AND THIS PACKGE HAD NO DOT LABELS ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE PACKAGE. 18X1 FLUID LITER REGULATED PLASTIC BOTTLE OF CLARIO ADVANCED ALCOHOL HAND SANITIZER NO DAMAGE NO RELEASE OF CONTENTS. THE PACKAGE CONTAINS REGULATED ITEMS WITH NO DOT LABEL ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE PACKAGE MAKING THIS PACKAGE UNDECLARED.

item.title: Report X-2024121088
item.description:
Report X-2024121088

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-20
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg shipped as Fully Regulated. Pkg has no Hazmat markings of any kind. Pkg flagged for Hazmat Acceptance Process (HAP) at pickup facility which is other than the assigned origin for the shipper and HAP was not performed forwarding the pkg to the Next Load Point where it was removed from pkg flow for proper handling.

item.title: Report X-2024121053
item.description:
Report X-2024121053

Identified by scraper @ 2024-12-26T21:13:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-19
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg has no Hazmat markings indicating hazardous contents. Pkg contains 8 x 25 oz. metal aerosol cans. Outer carton is wet from a leaking trailer which weakened the carton causing it to rip and the tape on the closures to fail allowing the contents to fall out exposing the undeclared hazardous contents which are missing caps, have ripped labels and are dented. Pressurized contents will be repacked as prescribed.
